org.dmd.util.formatting
Class CodeFormatter

java.lang.Object
  org.dmd.util.formatting.CodeFormatter

public class CodeFormatter
extends java.lang.Object

The CodeFormatter class contains a variety of static utility methods that are useful when dumping code.

Constructor Summary
CodeFormatter()

static void dumpCodeComment(java.lang.String comment, java.io.BufferedWriter out, java.lang.String indent)
          This function dumps the description of a class as a code comment.

          This function dumps the description of a class as a code comment.

          Splits a fully qualified class name at dot boundaries up to the maxLength.
static java.lang.String getTheClass(java.lang.String fullyQualified)

Method Detail

dumpCodeComment

public static void dumpCodeComment(java.lang.String comment,
                                   java.io.BufferedWriter out,
                                   java.lang.String indent)
                            throws java.io.IOException
This function dumps the description of a class as a code comment. Long lines are folded to 75 characters.

Parameters:
comment - The comment to be written
out - The output buffer.
indent - The indent string.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

dumpCodeComment

public static void dumpCodeComment(java.lang.String comment,
                                   java.lang.StringBuffer out,
                                   java.lang.String indent)
This function dumps the description of a class as a code comment. Long lines are folded to 75 characters.

Parameters:
comment - The comment to be written
out - The output buffer.
indent - The indent string.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Takes a fully qualified class name and returns just the class name portion.

Just the class name.

foldFullyQualified

public static java.lang.String foldFullyQualified(java.lang.String fullyQualified,
                                                  int maxLength)
Splits a fully qualified class name at dot boundaries up to the maxLength.

Parameters:
fullyQualified -
maxLength -
Returns:
the folded string with line breaks near the max length
